title: British Police Arrest Former Prince Andrew Amid Scrutiny Over Epstein Ties
summary_full: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, a longtime associate of Jeffrey Epstein, is being investigated on suspicion of misconduct in public office.
summary_public: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, a longtime associate of Jeffrey Epstein, is being investigated on suspicion of misconduct in public office.
